extendedInfo.description: ***** ON SALE TODAY - 50% OFF ****Breathing Zone is a doctor recommended guided breathing exercise. In just 5 minutes you can start to enjoy the deep relaxation and other health benefits of slower therapeutic breathing.â¢ Recommended by Harvard Health Newsletter.â¢ Recommended by Time.com Techland.â¢ Recommended by Lifehacker.The guided breathing exercise used by Breathing Zone has been shown to help:â¢ Reduce Anxiety.â¢ Relieve Stress.â¢ Lower High Blood Pressure.â¢ Improve Mood.Breathing Zone uses a clinically proven therapeutic breathing technique that decreases your heart rate, and over time can even help lower High Blood Pressure. There are no complicated settings and no difficult breathing patterns to master. All you need to do is breathe in and out according to the guide. Anyone can it.Features: â¢ Easy to follow voice instructions.â¢ Intuitive animated breathing guide. â¢ 5 calming guide sounds.â¢ Vibration mode (on supported devices).â¢ Timed sessions from 5 to 60 minutes. â¢ Weekly Target tracks your therapeutic breathing minutes.REVIEWS: â¤ Harvard Health Newsletter You can choose an audio accompaniment and set the length of your relaxation session. You then breathe in and out in sync with an image that pulsates at a gradually slower pace."â¤ Time.com Techland  "If you find yourself becoming over agitated calm yourself with Breathing Zone, a handy iPhone app that'll help keep the typical stress of fomenting unrest somewhat in check."â¤ Lifehacker "If you're a bit stressed or anxious, it's a good way to help you alleviate those feelings in just a few minutes."â¤ Jessica Garrett Mills, PhDBreathing Zone takes the guess work out of meditation. Itâs completely devoid of any new-agey-ness that might rub some folks the wrong way. Itâs basically just guided breathing.

reviews.title: Unbelievable!
reviews.comment: I just used this app with the water flow prompt at 5.5 bpm. I ran my own music in the background. All I can say is unbelievable! My arms and legs are soooo relaxed. Hope this helps with blood pressure. Judging by how relaxed I feel, I have high hopes that it will. Wish I could take my tablet to the dentist....I wouldn\'t need the relaxing stuff they give me.. .
reviews.author: amy B

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: I love this app. Just one comment for developer, please make this app keep running in sleep mode. Otherwise i need to keep the screen on, which increase phone temperature and battery consuming.
reviews.author: Popporn Kosaikanont

reviews.comment: Brilliant little app and easy to use. Has helped me make deep breathing a part of my everyday ruiteen, and to deepen my breath. Thank you x
reviews.author: Jennie Jitsakul

reviews.title: Blood Pressure Reduction :-)
reviews.comment: For those of you who suffer from high blood pressure this is the app.I had a bp averaging  160/90.After using this app now 123/77.Now thats unreal.Ill be speaking to my Doctor now about not going on meds!
reviews.author: Joe soap

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app for controlled breathing practice. Colorful visual focuses your attention on the selected breathing rhythm. Lowers blood pressure and anxiety in just 5 minutes breathing at 6 bpm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprised.
reviews.comment: I downloaded this because I was having issues sleeping comfortably, tossing and turning. After a 10 minute session using the water sound I seriously felt relaxed and ready to pass out! Couldn\'t believe it, this is great.
reviews.author: Tyler Wintringham

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.comment: I have had professional deep breathing therapy and can only say that this app is brilliant. It can be used any time of the day and is invaluable for aiding a good nights sleep. Everyone should try it
reviews.author: Trevor Groves

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app functions really well, in that it brings me to a level of \"coherence\" on the emwave2 almost immediately.   Ideas for future versions: presets (like insight timer), a broader range of goals, and maybe some graphs of past performance.  But it really does a great job restoring calm.
reviews.author: Duane Rudy

reviews.title: Just great
reviews.comment: I needed an app to lower bp I have used a machine in the past with chest trap this wotks just has well, but needs to run in the background otherwise great app.
reviews.author: Roger Wilcox

reviews.title: Very Useful App!
reviews.comment: Will upgrade rating to 5 stars once it will continue to run in sleep mode.  I need to be able to shutdown and lock my display.  I initially chose this app over other breath pacing apps based on its simple UI and ability to use \"vibrate mode\" as a guide.
reviews.author: Michael Bray

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Best breathing app out there.
reviews.author: Bryan Johnson

reviews.title: Works well.
reviews.comment: Really like it with great results.  Could use a little tweaking with an auto-slowing feature.  Good app.
reviews.author: Austin Brown

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: The best of the 6 or so breathing apps I tried. Worth the money over the free apps.
reviews.author: Matt S

reviews.title: Hat trick
reviews.comment: It helped me win a dart tournament, a game of that requires high concentration and relaxation, for the first time. The smoothness between each breath is amazing.
reviews.author: JUAN GARDEA

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I love this app!
reviews.author: Riley Gabel

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app looks nice. It does what it is supposed to do well. It also has a lot of adjustability.
reviews.author: James Wilczewski

reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Jenehra Allen

reviews.comment: So far so good
reviews.author: Cesar Javier

reviews.title: Relaxing
reviews.comment: Edited since using the app. In my new found state of relaxation I am able to see that I was both unfair and inaccurate with my previous rating.  It\'s a great app that WILL help you to relax. Buy it! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice and useful app..
reviews.comment: I only wish there were more different pictures/themes to choose from.
reviews.author: A Google User
